title: [Large-scale] Analysis of Satisfaction and Perceptions in Blended Mathematics Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Instructional design scenario for analyzing remote education satisfaction and perceptions when conducting blended classes in mathematics under a provided digital device environment

learning_goals: Learners can assess operational status and measure satisfaction levels of distance education in blended learning environments
Learners can analyze advantages and limitations of distance education considering mathematics curriculum characteristics and propose improvement strategies
Learners can statistically validate perceptual differences among learner groups using online survey tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
